picked_headlines.summary: Meituan's WOWService uses LLMs to enhance customer support, improving satisfaction and reducing costs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article showcases a practical application of LLMs in business, highlighting its impact on customer service, a crucial area for stakeholders and technical teams alike.

picked_headlines.summary: Overview of YOLO evolution, detailing innovations, benchmarking, deployment, and future challenges in object detection.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article provides insights into the evolution of a popular object detection model, relevant for engineers focusing on computer vision and stakeholders interested in AI advancements.

digest:
- *Automatic Speech Recognition in the Modern Era* reviews ASR technologies, focusing on architectures and evaluation metrics. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12827*
- *NOSA* introduces a sparse attention framework improving LLM decoding efficiency by 2.3x. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.13602*
- *PRISM* offers a training-free method for multimodal data selection, reducing costs significantly. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.12119*
- *OpenDerisk* is an AI framework for SRE, enhancing diagnostic reasoning and collaboration. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.13561*
- *Tensor Logic* proposes a new AI programming language unifying neural and symbolic AI. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12269*
- *MedREK* enhances medical LLMs with a retrieval-based framework for accurate batch-editing. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.13500*
- *ReSum* improves LLM web agents by summarizing context, enhancing search efficiency. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13313*
- *DeepPlanner* enhances planning in LLMs using entropy-based advantage shaping. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12979*
- *InferA* uses LLMs for efficient analysis of large scientific datasets, enhancing user interaction. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12920*
- *HealthProcessAI* simplifies healthcare process mining using LLMs for automated analysis. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21540*
